title: Kaito KA200 Pocket AM/FM Radio, Black
description: If you want a real high quality AM/FM radio that you can pick up station in a remote area, this KA200 is a right to use. the super slim size with super Hi-quality circuitry built in, this radio makes you believe that Kaito is a serious manufacturer of the radios, you can compare this radio with any similar radio on the market, this KA200 is simply better than any of them. It is good for sports and travelers.
